facelet-taglib.description: The Liferay Faces Bridge facelet component tags with the bridge: tag name prefix.

tag.description: InputFile is a UIInput component that renders an <input> element with type=file. Since it extends HtmlInputFile, it supports all the features of h:inputFile and also supports multi-file uploads.

attribute.description: Specify the model here for a url to adjust permissions for model related actions.
attribute.name: modelResource

attribute.description: Describes the model resource that the url permits the user to adjust.
attribute.name: modelResourceDescription

attribute.description: When true, the url will specify that the user should be redirected to the permissions page.
attribute.name: redirect

attribute.description: The scope group id for the resource. The default value is LiferayFacesContext.getInstance().getScopeGroupId()
attribute.name: resourceGroupId

attribute.description: The primary key used to identify the resource.
attribute.name: resourcePrimKey

attribute.description: A list of integers cooresponding to roleTypes that the url would permit the user to adjust.
attribute.name: roleTypes

attribute.description: The name of the variable to introduce into the expression language to use the resulting url.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Specifys the resulting windowState of the permissions portlet.
attribute.name: windowState
